description: Politicians in Germany, France and Italy all express hope that summer holidays will go ahead.
title: Coronavirus: Summer holidays abroad possible, German official says
title_page: Coronavirus: Summer holidays abroad possible, German official says - BBC News
maintext: "What I can say is that we will limit major international travel, even during the summer. We will stay among Europeans and, depending on how the epidemic evolves, we might have to reduce that a little more."
